query:
Which cardiovascular complications are directly associated with FGF23 excess?

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Atherosclerosis
B: Left ventricular hypertrophy
C: Atrial fibrillation
D: Heart failure

Which miRNA directly targets DNMT1 and reactivates tumor suppressor genes like KLF4 and E-cadherin in PDAC cells?

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: miR-152
B: miR-148a
C: miR-377
D: miR-17-92

Which factors contribute to impaired nuclear translocation of GRα in secondary GCR?

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Increased FKBP51 expression
B: Reduced MUC1 levels
C: Overexpression of PP2A
D: Elevated HSP90 in the cytoplasm

Which therapy reduces mast cell burden by targeting CD117?

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Omalizumab
B: Barzolvolimab
C: Lirentelimab
D: Cladribine

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: CCND1 amplification
B: CDKN2A deletion
C: CDK6 mutations
D: RB1 amplification

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Kinase domain
B: Helical domain
C: Adaptor-binding domain (ABD)
D: C2 domain

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Reduces collagen deposition
B: Increases regulatory T cells
C: Worsens hepatic necrosis
D: Improves diastolic function

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Chondrosarcoma
B: Melanoma
C: Thyroid cancer
D: Colorectal cancer

This is a multiple-choice question, and more than one option may be correct. Please select all that apply.

A: Testosterone
B: Dihydrotestosterone (DHT)
C: Oxandrolone
D: Methyl testosterone

A: Glycolysis
B: Purine metabolism
